channel.title: hugo on My blog
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on My blog

item.title: Easy Way To Embed Asciinema Into Hugo
item.description: As a blog author, especially those related to computing, sometimes we need a media that can support the content. There are many ways to support content, including screenshots and video recording. but if we are faced with commandline interactive, it doesn’t feel right if we use screenshots or video recording as a means of documentation. it’s time for us to get acquainted Asciinema, with this tool let’s forget about recording and video applications that look terrible due to blur The main features offered by Asciinema include:

item.title: Added Cactus Comments to Hugo
item.description: Add a comment field in hugo with cactus comment
